name: JP Schoolgirl Supervisor Multiplayer
description:
Japanese School Girl Supervisor Online Multiplayer - Standalone, CO-OP, Sandbox or Battle Royale is the next GEN Version of Schoolgirl Supervisor - Saori Sato Wildlife.

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ STORY ★ ★ ★ ★ ★
You are taking control of Saori Sato who has become new schoolgirl Supevisor of Sayama High School.

Are you able to handle her shift on her very first day?

★ ★ ★ ★ ★ BUGS / MISSING FEATURES ? ★ ★ ★ ★ ★
If you found a bug or you are missing a specific Features, simply write a Comment/Review below :)
I appreciate any kind of comments! Good or Bad one :)


★ ★ ★ ★ ★ PROBLEMS WITH UPDATE? ★ ★ ★ ★ ★
If the game does not launch anymore after an Update. Uninstall the game. Reboot your DEVICE and INSTALL it again.



★ ★ ★ ★ ★ FEATURES ★ ★ ★ ★ ★
★ Full Multiplayer, Standalone, Sandbox, CO-OP or Battle Royale Game experience
★ You can play with your friends, play alone or meet new players by joining other rooms
★ different Modi are possible
★ personalize your Avatar choose different idle, walking and running animations
★ personalize your camera, choose far, very far, default or close-up camera
★ Use Pose Mode to pose your Avatar or Pose other NPCs (None playable characters)
★ Full free chat is available
★ Absolutely remarkable light baked Graphics combined with Realtime Light and Shadows
★ Play at DAYLIGHT or at NIGHT just equipped with your Flashlight
★ Fly around like a BIRDIE BIRD
★ Hundreds of Quests and Dialogue Options
★ A huge big School Building Complex is about to be explored, more than 20 different Buildings, each building with an incredible high amount of details and mystery
★ customize your Avatar in ANY way you can imagin
★ customize ANY NPC in this game in any way you like. You can create your absolute unique school girls experiences
★ still looking for even more customization? Download the Extended Shop and apply your own Textures for Uniform, Skin, Hair or Face/Eyes. Literally billions of different combinations are possible
★ use your Horse to ride around the School or in the Sayama Forest
★ take control of your cat and play as a schoolgirl pussycat
★ buy Wings and fly around like an angel
★ arrest bullies and other bad students or play online and arrest other players
★ buy pets such as wolves, snakes, deers, salamanders and many more that follow you during your adventure
★ not another yandere school game but unique gameplay
★ join Clans and equip privileged items
★ compare yourself with other players in the leaderboard
★ download more than 400 Outfit++ School Uniform Textures that are fully seen by other players in Multiplayer Game
★ take photos of your gameplay and share it directly in the game using the Global Chat
★ buy Skills that improve your abilities (become immortal, super short cooldown, solution architect, escape trick, private chat and more)


★ ★ ★ ★ ★ HOW TO PLAY ★ ★ ★ ★ ★
★ swipe on the left side leads to Player movement, swipe on the right leads to camera rotation
★ the crosshatch in the middle shows you if you can interact with any objects or other none playable character
★ you can jump by using the Jump button
★ switch to LETHAL or NONE-LETHAL depending if you wanna kill or talk
★ Check your To-Do lists and do the quests, talk to NPC to get more quests or explore the environment to do Environmental Story telling
★ At the end there should be more than 200 different quests and puzzles to solve
★ a real time food / drinking / caring simulation
